layer_sequence_pause.htm+html.head.title: layer_sequence_pause.htm+html.body.p:87-3
layer_sequence_pause: With this function you can pause the playback of the given sequence. You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions and the function will pause the sequence until you begin playback again using the function layer_sequence_play().

layer_sequence_pause.htm+html.head.title: layer_sequence_pause.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:99-9
layer_sequence_pause: The unique ID value of the sequence element to target

layer_sequence_pause.htm+html.head.title: layer_sequence_pause.htm+html.body.p:112-3
layer_sequence_pause: The above code creates a new sequence and stores its ID in a local variable. It then checks to see if the game is paused, and if it is it pauses the playback of the sequence.
